name: lircv0.9.4_node
description: Control LIRCv0.9.4 and up from Node, forked from lirc_node. irsend list's output format changed, breaking the original lirc_node. This is a quick and dirty fix, breaking compatibility with previous versions of LIRC.

scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test mocha --require should --require test/common.js --reporter dot --timeout 5000 test/*.js

author: Alex Bain <alex@alexba.in>
